divs: Sighting DetailsI was trying to go asleep at a sleep over at a friends house.Then, in the window, a giant cigar shaped thing brigtened up the room.I thought it was an airplane or a weather baloon.It spinned around and stopped,it almost seemed like a giant paper clip.I had my eyes wide open.Then,it speeding off about 10 miles.
Summary: i saw a light for 11 seconds then flashed about 10 miles south.
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Howell
There was one other sighting in Howell on or around November 11th 2005
